sentence.Network_en: Life for the successful doctor can be emotionally and financially rewarding.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于事业有成的医生来说，生活在精神和物质两方面都能令人满足。

sentence.Network_en: Buy a policy only from an insurance company that is financially sound.
sentence.Network_cn: 一定要从财务状况良好的保险公司购买保险。
这个公司经济实力非常可靠。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Nearly all of them hold their own financially(财政上) and many of them are very profitable(赚钱). These papers are written almost entirely for.

although divorce is traditionally discouraged in China , over the past 20 years the rate has soared . this is said to be due to women becoming more financially independent and divorce procedures being simplified .尽管离婚在传统意义上不被提倡，但在过去20年中，我国的离婚率大幅上升。据有关分析，这
because ill management , the crisis happened financially .由于管理不善，财务状况产生危机。

my wife and I have excellent credit . we just don't cave into and spend our savings or liquidate stocks to pay for consumer debt . that is not too financially intelligent .我和我妻子都有着良好的信用，我们不会陷入债务危机，或靠动用储蓄、卖出股票来偿付消费债务，因为这样做在财务上就太不明智了。

list.abs: 过去一周中，在谷歌搜索引擎中搜索关键词“财经新闻(financial news)”时，用户将会看到一条《华尔街日报》的广告。点击这条广告后…
金融时报（financial times）集团是世界财经新闻和分析权威，旗舰是金融时报（financial times）（Financial Times），在世界十二个城市印刷，为世界财经时报之最。其 …
会计专业_百度百科 ... 审计会计 Audit 财务会计（financial accounting） Financial Accounting 管理会计 Management Accounting.
中日会计用语 ... 対帐単 statement of account 财务报表 Financial Statement 资产负债表 Balance Sheet.

entry.def: Financial means relating to or involving money.

example.ex: The company is in financial difficulties.

means.word_mean: 1. from a financial point of view;

auth_sentence.content: Would the constitutional change be economically and financially stable?
auth_sentence.res_content: Would the constitutional change be economically and financially stable?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Would the constitutional change be economically and financially stable?

auth_sentence.content: Farmers say it will take years to recover financially.
auth_sentence.res_content: Farmers say it will take years to recover financially.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Farmers say it will take years to recover financially.

auth_sentence.content: The Barrett family is struggling financially but otherwise unremarkable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Barrett family is struggling financially but otherwise unremarkable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Barrett family is struggling financially but otherwise unremarkable.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: The people we see now have three or four part-time jobs and they're still right on the edge financially.
Guy Grant chose to work as a researcher at Cambridge in order to do financially more rewarding work.

sentences.en: He is financially able to establish a home.
sentences.cn: 他在经济上有能力成家。

sentences.en: He was financially involved with a villain.
sentences.cn: 他在经济上与一个恶棍混在了一起。

sentences.en: I expect to be compensated financially.
sentences.cn: 我希望能得到经济补偿。

sentences.en: Emotionally,physically,and financially I was on the ropes.
sentences.cn: 我在感情上、身体上和经济上都快支持不住了。
